tool_description: Enriches basic contact information with additional professional, personal, and behavioral data from multiple sources to create comprehensive prospect profiles.

contact_email.description: Primary email address of the contact to enrich

enrichment_categories.description: Data categories to enrich: professional, personal, social, behavioral, preferences

data_freshness.description: Required data freshness: recent, standard, any

include_photos.description: Whether to include profile photos if available

error_messages: Invalid email format: Please provide a valid email address
Contact not found: No additional information found for the specified contact
Invalid enrichment category: Supported categories are professional, personal, social, behavioral, preferences
Invalid data freshness: Use recent, standard, or any
Enrichment service unavailable: External data services are temporarily unavailable
Privacy restrictions: Some contact data is protected and cannot be enriched
usage: Provide the contact's email address and optionally their name and company. Specify which data categories to enrich and data freshness requirements.

enrichment_status.description: Status of enrichment: complete, partial, failed

additional_emails.description: Additional email addresses found for the contact

phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers associated with the contact

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for enriched data accuracy (0-100)
